attributes.action: Stop UK tourist accomodation increasing prices to cover covid losses
attributes.additional_details: We have seen government help Self-employed through Grants and help for staff wages through Furlough. But now there are Lots of Tourism businesses trying to regain last years part season and this years early season losses within one trading year. and with Europe and other destinations going in and out of amber lists, these UK companies Know they will get whatever price they put out there
attributes.background: There needs to be a cap on how much Campsites and UK Hotels B&B's etc can increase prices in a year. as we have seen increases of 70% over last years prices

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting or capping prices of private accomodation.
